name: Crazy Mazey
overview: In Crazy Mazey, there are all kinds of cash hidden throughout the city streets, but someone has tipped off the killer goons, who are going to try to stop you. You can't outrun the goons, so you're going to have to try to outmaneuver them, using your wits and agility to gather all the cash and escape town. You drive a small vehicle over a cityscape, attempting to avoid enemy vehicles. Your goal is to gather all the cash symbols on the screen. After doing this, an exit from the stage will appear in the top left corner, and the player can drive to this to complete the level. There are a total of 9 different stages or maps, with 7 difficulty levels which set the speed of vehicles. The player gains 100 points for each piece of loot collected. The enemy vehicles will incessantly travel towards the player, and if two enemy vehicles come in contact, they will be destroyed. There is no other way to eliminate enemy vehicles. The player has a total of 3 cars, and will lose a vehicle when they run into another vehicle. Lose 3 cars, and it's game over.
